Text: Replaces "Gross Pixelation Errors" in all previous "Scene" releases @ 27:58
MP4SUX@is the latest fringe episode gross pixelation error free??

Short answer - yes, I checked.

Thought you were mad at my Red Dwarf screw up.

Not a rant, insight into my "process". If it's LOL, I specifically check for such errors. For instance, if you check out the first LOL or DIMENSION entry for that fringe episode, you can see that I specifically certified it free of Gross Piexelation Errors in the comment section.

If I say it, I've checked.

AVIGUY
MP4SUX@No I wasn't mad about your rant I was just annoyed due to the red dwarf screw up
